title: Is BVRIT CSE better than VNR IT? - Quora
tags: Padmasri Dr. B.V. Raju Institute of Technology
VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute Of Engineering And Technology (VNRVJIET)

response.answer_text: Hello Friend Firstly CSE & IT are almost Same as far as I know, U can Once check the syllabus n compare them. Moreover During campus placements both branches are given same priority, They don't see branch but they see skills in students. Now coming to Colleges both the colleges are good & Autonomous. But what i can say is VNR VJIET is one of the Top 3 Pvt. Eamcet Colleges in Hyd .The environment & most of the faculty are student friendly. You are free to explore here. Moreover VNR is situated very close to Jntu-H, so u can get the chance to take coachings,etc.. I suggest you to visit the colleges & approach the students over there, then you will get a clear idea ( der r lot more to say abt VNR ,so I suggested u to visit both the colleges) Now you are the person to choose what's Good for, choose the best one. Hope it helped, All the best !!!

I would prefer VNR IT as it a good college with 100% placements.Moreover CSE and IT are almost the same. BVRIT is also a good college with good placements but VNR is one of the top colleges in telangana.Best of luck:)
